00045 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 #ifdef HTCFG_HSI_AUTO_TRIM_BY_LSE
00047 #define GET_MS()  (u32)TIME_TICK2MS(Time_GetTick())
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 #define RX_BUFFER_SIZE                            (64)
00052 #define RX_FULL_CHECK                             (0) // Use PDMA Block end interrupt to check the Rx full status
00053 
00054 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00055 void PDMA_Configuration(void);
00056 void UxART_Configuration(void);
00057 
00058 u32 UxART_PDMA_Tx(uc8 *TxBuffer, u32 length);
00059 u32 UxART_PDMA_RxReadByte(u8* pBuf);
00060 u32 UxART_PDMA_RxReadBlock(u8* pBuf, u32 uLen);
00061 u32 UxART_PDMA_RxGetLength(void);
00062 u32 UxART_PDMA_RxIsFull(void);
00063 
00064 void UxART_RxMainRoutine(void);
00065 void LED_Toggle(void);

00068 ErrStatus WaitLSEClockReady(u32 uTimeout_ms);
00069 ErrStatus HSIAutoTrimConfig(CKCU_ATC_TypeDef CLKSRC, u32 uTimeout_ms);
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00073 #define GetRxBufferReadIndex()                    gRxBufferReadIndex
00074 #define GetRxBufferWriteIndex()                   (RX_BUFFER_SIZE - HTCFG_PDMA_CURRENT_TRANSFER_SIZE)
00075 #define IsRxBufferEmpty()                         (GetRxBufferWriteIndex() == GetRxBufferReadIndex())
00076 #define IsRxBufferFull()                          ((GetRxBufferWriteIndex() + 1) == RX_BUFFER_SIZE ? (0 == GetRxBufferReadIndex()) : ((GetRxBufferWriteIndex() + 1) == GetRxBufferReadIndex()))
00077 
00078 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00079 PDMACH_InitTypeDef gPDMACH_TxStructure;
00080 PDMACH_InitTypeDef gPDMACH_RxStructure;
00081 
00082 vu32 gIsUxART_PDMA_TxBusy = FALSE;
00083 
00084 u8 gRxBuffer[RX_BUFFER_SIZE];
00085 
00086 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00087 u32 gRxBufferReadIndex = 0;
00088 uc8 gHelloString[] = "Hello, this is USART Tx/Rx PDMA example. Please enter characters.....\r\n";
00089 
00090 u8 gTempBuffer[64];
00091 
00092 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00093 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00094   * @brief  Main program.
00095   * @retval None
00096   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00097 int main(void)
00098 {
00099   #ifdef HTCFG_HSI_AUTO_TRIM_BY_LSE
00100   Time_Init();
00101   if (WaitLSEClockReady(2000) == ERROR)
00102   {
00103     #if 1
00104     // Wait for LSE clock Ready timeout, do the error handling here
00105     while(1);
00106     #endif
00107   }
00108 
00109   if (HSIAutoTrimConfig(CKCU_ATC_LSE, 2000) == ERROR)
00110   {
00111     #if 1
00112     // Wait for HSI Auto Trim Ready timeout, do the error handling here
00113     while(1);
00114     #endif
00115   }
00116   #endif
00117 
00118   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00119 
00120   PDMA_Configuration();
00121   UxART_Configuration();
00122 
00123   /* Send hello information by PDMA mode                                                                    */
00124   UxART_PDMA_Tx(gHelloString, sizeof(gHelloString) - 1);
00125 
00126   while (1)
00127   {
00128     UxART_RxMainRoutine();
00129     LED_Toggle();
00130   }
00131 }
00132 
00133 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00134   * @brief  Configure the PDMA.
00135   * @retval None
00136   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00137 void PDMA_Configuration(void)
00138 {
00139   /* Enable peripheral clock of PDMA                                                                        */
00140   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00141   CKCUClock.Bit.PDMA   = 1;
00142   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00143 
00144   /* Tx PDMA channel configuration                                                                          */
00145   gPDMACH_TxStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32)NULL;
00146   gPDMACH_TxStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32)&HTCFG_UART_PORT->DR;
00147   gPDMACH_TxStructure.PDMACH_BlkCnt = 0;
00148   gPDMACH_TxStructure.PDMACH_BlkLen = 1;
00149   gPDMACH_TxStructure.PDMACH_DataSize = WIDTH_8BIT;
00150   gPDMACH_TxStructure.PDMACH_Priority = M_PRIO;
00151   gPDMACH_TxStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod = SRC_ADR_LIN_INC | DST_ADR_FIX;
00152   #if 0 // Config and Enable DMA when Start Tx
00153   PDMA_Config(HTCFG_TX_PDMA_CH, &gPDMACH_TxStructure);
00154   PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_TX_PDMA_CH, ENABLE);
00155   #endif
00156   PDMA_IntConfig(HTCFG_TX_PDMA_CH, PDMA_INT_GE | PDMA_INT_TC, ENABLE);
00157 
00158   /* Rx PDMA channel configuration                                                                          */
00159   gPDMACH_RxStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32)&HTCFG_UART_PORT->DR;
00160   gPDMACH_RxStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32)gRxBuffer;
00161   gPDMACH_RxStructure.PDMACH_BlkCnt = RX_BUFFER_SIZE;
00162   gPDMACH_RxStructure.PDMACH_BlkLen = 1;
00163   gPDMACH_RxStructure.PDMACH_DataSize = WIDTH_8BIT;
00164   gPDMACH_RxStructure.PDMACH_Priority = H_PRIO;
00165   gPDMACH_RxStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod = SRC_ADR_FIX | DST_ADR_LIN_INC | AUTO_RELOAD;
00166   PDMA_Config(HTCFG_RX_PDMA_CH, &gPDMACH_RxStructure);
00167   PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_RX_PDMA_CH, ENABLE);
00168   #if 0 // Auto Reload by PDMA
00169   PDMA_IntConfig(HTCFG_RX_PDMA_CH, PDMA_INT_GE | PDMA_INT_TC, ENABLE);
00170   #endif
00171 
00172   #if (RX_FULL_CHECK == 1)
00173   PDMA_IntConfig(HTCFG_RX_PDMA_CH, PDMA_INT_GE | PDMA_INT_BE, ENABLE);
00174   #endif
00175 
00176   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_PDMA_IRQ);
00177 }
00178 
00179 /*************************************************************************************************************
00180   * @brief  Configure the UxART
00181   * @retval None
00182   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00183 void UxART_Configuration(void)
00184 {
00185   #if 0 // Use following function to configure the IP clock speed.
00186   // The UxART IP clock speed must be faster 16x then the baudrate.
00187   CKCU_SetPeripPrescaler(CKCU_PCLK_UxARTn, CKCU_APBCLKPRE_DIV2);
00188   #endif
00189 
00190   { /* Enable peripheral clock of AFIO, UxART                                                               */
00191     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00192     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO                   = 1;
00193     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_CLK = 1;
00194     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_UART_IPN         = 1;
00195     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00196   }
00197 
00198   /* Turn on UxART Rx internal pull up resistor to prevent unknow state                                     */
00199   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_PR_UP);
00200 
00201   /* Config AFIO mode as UxART function.                                                                    */
00202   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_UART_TX_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_UART_TX_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_USART_UART);
00203   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_UART_RX_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_USART_UART);
00204 
00205   {
00206     /* UxART configured as follow:
00207           - BaudRate = 115200 baud
00208           - Word Length = 8 Bits
00209           - One Stop Bit
00210           - None parity bit
00211     */
00212 
00213     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00214        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00215        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00216     */
00217     USART_InitTypeDef USART_InitStructure;
00218     USART_InitStructure.USART_BaudRate = 115200;
00219     USART_InitStructure.USART_WordLength = USART_WORDLENGTH_8B;
00220     USART_InitStructure.USART_StopBits = USART_STOPBITS_1;
00221     USART_InitStructure.USART_Parity = USART_PARITY_NO;
00222     USART_InitStructure.USART_Mode = USART_MODE_NORMAL;
00223     USART_Init(HTCFG_UART_PORT, &USART_InitStructure);
00224   }
00225 
00226   #if 0 // Enable UxART TX DMA when Start Tx
00227   /* Enable UxART TX trigger DMA                                                                            */
00228   USART_PDMACmd(HTCFG_UART_PORT, USART_PDMAREQ_TX, ENABLE);
00229   #endif
00230 
00231   /* Enable UxART RX trigger DMA                                                                            */
00232   USART_PDMACmd(HTCFG_UART_PORT, USART_PDMAREQ_RX, ENABLE);
00233 
00234   /* Enable UxART Tx and Rx function                                                                        */
00235   USART_TxCmd(HTCFG_UART_PORT, ENABLE);
00236   USART_RxCmd(HTCFG_UART_PORT, ENABLE);
00237 }
00238 
00239 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00240   * @brief  UxART send a buffer by PDMA.
00241   * @retval None
00242   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00243 u32 UxART_PDMA_Tx(uc8 *TxBuffer, u32 length)
00244 {
00245   /* Wait until previou Tx finished                                                                         */
00246   while (gIsUxART_PDMA_TxBusy == TRUE);
00247 
00248   /* UxART Tx PDMA channel configuration                                                                    */
00249   gPDMACH_TxStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32)TxBuffer;
00250   gPDMACH_TxStructure.PDMACH_BlkCnt = length;
00251   PDMA_Config(HTCFG_TX_PDMA_CH, &gPDMACH_TxStructure);
00252   PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_TX_PDMA_CH, ENABLE);
00253 
00254   gIsUxART_PDMA_TxBusy = TRUE;
00255   USART_PDMACmd(HTCFG_UART_PORT, USART_PDMAREQ_TX, ENABLE);
00256 
00257   return length;
00258 }
00259 
00260 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00261   * @brief  Read byte from Rx buffer.
00262   * @retval 0: No Data, 1 Read Success
00263   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00264 u32 UxART_PDMA_RxReadByte(u8 *pBuf)
00265 {
00266   if (IsRxBufferEmpty())
00267   {
00268     return 0;
00269   }
00270   else
00271   {
00272     *pBuf = gRxBuffer[gRxBufferReadIndex++];
00273     if (gRxBufferReadIndex == RX_BUFFER_SIZE)
00274     {
00275       gRxBufferReadIndex = 0;
00276     }
00277     return 1;
00278   }
00279 }
00280 
00281 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00282   * @brief  Read block from Rx buffer.
00283   * @retval Data length
00284   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00285 u32 UxART_PDMA_RxReadBlock(u8 *pBuf, u32 uLen)
00286 {
00287   u32 i = 0;
00288   for (i = 0; i < uLen; i++)
00289   {
00290     if (IsRxBufferEmpty())
00291     {
00292       break;
00293     }
00294     *pBuf++ = gRxBuffer[gRxBufferReadIndex++];
00295     if (gRxBufferReadIndex == RX_BUFFER_SIZE)
00296     {
00297       gRxBufferReadIndex = 0;
00298     }
00299   }
00300   return i;
00301 }
00302 
00303 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00304   * @brief  Get Rx data length.
00305   * @retval Data length
00306   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00307 u32 UxART_PDMA_RxGetLength(void)
00308 {
00309   u32 uWrite = GetRxBufferWriteIndex();
00310   u32 uRead = GetRxBufferReadIndex();
00311 
00312   if (uWrite >= uRead)
00313   {
00314     return (uWrite - uRead);
00315   }
00316   else
00317   {
00318     return (RX_BUFFER_SIZE - uRead + uWrite);
00319   }
00320 }
00321 
00322 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00323   * @brief  Check Rx is full or not.
00324   * @retval 0: Rx is not full, 1: Rx is full
00325   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00326 u32 UxART_PDMA_RxIsFull(void)
00327 {
00328   return (IsRxBufferFull());
00329 }
00330 
00331 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00332   * @brief  UxART Rx Main Routine.
00333   * @retval None
00334   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00335 void UxART_RxMainRoutine(void)
00336 {
00337   #if 1
00338   if (UxART_PDMA_RxReadByte(gTempBuffer)) // Process data after 1 byte received
00339   {
00340     // Do data process here
00341 
00342     #if 1 // Loopback Rx data to Tx
00343     UxART_PDMA_Tx((uc8 *)&gTempBuffer, 1);
00344     #endif
00345   }
00346   #else
00347   if (UxART_PDMA_RxGetLength() >= 5)      // Process data after 5 byte received
00348   {
00349     u32 uLen;
00350     uLen = UxART_PDMA_RxReadBlock(gTempBuffer, UxART_PDMA_RxGetLength());
00351     // Do data process here
00352 
00353     #if 1 // Loopback Rx data to Tx
00354     UxART_PDMA_Tx((uc8 *)gTempBuffer, uLen);
00355     #endif
00356   }
00357   #endif
00358 }
00359 
00360 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00361   * @brief  LED Toggle function.
00362   * @retval None
00363   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00364 void LED_Toggle(void)
00365 {
00366   static u32 j = 0; // Global variable to control LED timing
00367 
00368   j++;
00369 
00370   if (j == 1000000)
00371   {
00372     j = 0;
00373     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED1);
00374   }
00375 }
00376 
00377 #ifdef HTCFG_HSI_AUTO_TRIM_BY_LSE
00378 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00379   * @brief  Wait LSE Clock Ready
00380   * @retval None
00381   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00382 ErrStatus WaitLSEClockReady(u32 uTimeout_ms)
00383 {
00384   u32 start=GET_MS();
00385 
00386   while (CKCU_GetClockReadyStatus(CKCU_FLAG_LSERDY) == RESET)
00387   {
00388     if (GET_MS() - start > uTimeout_ms)
00389     {
00390       return ERROR;
00391     }
00392   }
00393 
00394   return SUCCESS;
00395 }
00396 
00397 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00398   * @brief  Auto Trim by LSE configuration.
00399   * @retval None
00400   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00401 ErrStatus HSIAutoTrimConfig(CKCU_ATC_TypeDef CLKSRC, u32 uTimeout_ms)
00402 {
00403   u32 start;
00404   CKCU_HSIAutoTrimClkConfig(CLKSRC);
00405   CKCU_HSIAutoTrimCmd(ENABLE);
00406 
00407   start=GET_MS();
00408   if (uTimeout_ms != 0)
00409   {
00410     while (CKCU_HSIAutoTrimIsReady() == FALSE)
00411     {
00412       if (GET_MS() - start > uTimeout_ms)
00413       {
00414          return ERROR;
00415       }
00416     }
00417   }
00418 
00419   return SUCCESS;
00420 }
00421 #endif

00430 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00431 {
00432   /*
00433      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00434      Debug message can be added here.
00435      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00436   */
00437 
00438   while (1)
00439   {
00440   }
00441 }
00442 #endif
